qas.question: "Jesus Walks" was on which of Kanye's albums?
September of 2014, Kanye called himself a what during one of his concerts?

context: After the success of his song "Jesus Walks" from the album <a1_0>The College Dropout<a1_0/>, West was questioned on his beliefs and said, "I will say that I'm spiritual. I have accepted Jesus as my Savior. And I will say that I fall short every day." More recently, in September 2014, West referred to himself as a <a0_0><a2_0>Christian<a2_0/><a0_0/> during one of his concerts.
